Package org.cloudbus.cloudsim

Class UtilizationModelStochastic

java.lang.Object
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.UtilizationModelStochastic
All Implemented Interfaces:
UtilizationModel
public class UtilizationModelStochastic
extends java.lang.Object
implements UtilizationModel
The UtilizationModelStochastic class implements a model, according to which a Cloudlet generates random CPU utilization every time frame.
Since:
CloudSim Toolkit 2.0
